portrait.basic: {subject}, professional portrait, natural lighting, sharp focus
portrait.detailed: {subject}, professional corporate portrait, shot on Canon EOS R5, 85mm f/1.4, ISO 400, natural window lighting from left, rule of thirds composition, neutral background, sharp focus on eyes, shallow depth of field
portrait.expert: {subject}, award-winning professional corporate portrait, shot on Phase One XF IQ4 150MP, Schneider Kreuznach 110mm f/2.8 LS, ISO 64, professional three-point studio lighting with key light at 45 degrees, fill light camera left, rim light for separation, backdrop in neutral gray (18% gray card matched), composition following Fibonacci spiral, sharp focus on eyes with catchlights, extremely shallow depth of field (f/2.8), professional color grading with skin tone correction, high-resolution detail capture

landscape.basic: {subject}, beautiful landscape, vibrant colors, wide angle
landscape.detailed: {subject}, award-winning landscape photography, golden hour lighting, dramatic clouds, shot on Sony A7R IV, 24-70mm f/2.8 at 35mm, f/11, ISO 100, polarizing filter, leading lines composition, foreground interest, vibrant color grading
landscape.expert: {subject}, award-winning fine art landscape photography, perfect golden hour lighting (30 minutes before sunset), dramatic cloud formations with crepuscular rays, shot on Sony A7R IV with Zeiss Batis 18mm f/2.8, f/16 for maximum depth of field, ISO 64 (native), graduated ND filter (3-stop), circular polarizing filter, focus-stacked (3 exposures), leading lines composition with strong foreground element, rule of thirds placement, HDR technique (5-bracket exposure fusion), professional color grading emphasizing warm sunset tones, ultra-high resolution detail

product.basic: {subject}, product photography, clean white background, well lit
product.detailed: {subject}, professional e-commerce product photography, pure white background (255,255,255 RGB), shot on Canon EOS R5, 100mm f/2.8 macro, f/11, ISO 100, softbox lighting from 45 degrees, no shadows, sharp focus throughout product, clean and minimal composition
product.expert: {subject}, premium commercial product photography, mathematically white background (RGB 255,255,255 verified), shot on Phase One XF IQ4 150MP with Schneider Kreuznach 120mm f/4 Macro LS, f/16 for extended depth of field, ISO 64, professional lighting setup with large softbox key light at 45 degrees camera left, fill light camera right, overhead light to eliminate top shadows, additional rim light for edge definition, focus-stacked (5-10 images) for complete sharpness, perfectly centered composition, professional retouching removing dust/imperfections, color-calibrated to match actual product (X-Rite ColorChecker verified)

macro.basic: {subject}, close-up macro photography, detailed, shallow focus
macro.detailed: {subject}, macro photography, shot on Canon EOS R5, 100mm f/2.8 macro lens, f/5.6, ISO 200, natural lighting with reflector, extreme detail capture, shallow depth of field with beautiful bokeh
macro.expert: {subject}, award-winning extreme macro photography, shot on Olympus OM-D E-M1X with M.Zuiko ED 60mm f/2.8 Macro (2:1 magnification), f/8 aperture for balance of detail and bokeh, ISO 400, focus rail for precision positioning, focus-stacked (20-50 images) for complete depth of field, diffused natural lighting with custom macro flash for fill, manual focus with Live View 10x magnification, extreme detail capture showing textures invisible to naked eye, professional post-processing to enhance natural colors and microstructure

architecture.detailed: {subject}, professional cloud architecture diagram, AWS/GCP style, color-coded components (blue for APIs, green for services, orange for databases, gray for external systems), clear hierarchical layout, labeled connections with data flow arrows
architecture.expert: {subject}, enterprise-grade cloud-native architecture diagram following AWS Well-Architected Framework, professional visual style matching AWS/GCP official documentation standards, color-coded layers (blue=#0066CC for API Gateway/ingress, green=#00AA00 for microservices tier, orange=#FF9900 for data persistence, red=#CC0000 for caching, gray=#666666 for external integrations), clear hierarchical layout with proper grouping (VPC boundaries, availability zones, security groups), labeled bidirectional arrows showing data flow with protocol annotations (HTTPS, gRPC, message queue), includes load balancers, auto-scaling groups, managed services icons (RDS, ElastiCache, S3), security annotations (IAM roles, encryption at rest/transit), clean professional aesthetic with subtle gradients and shadows for depth

flowchart.basic: {subject}, simple flowchart, clear flow, decision points
flowchart.detailed: {subject}, professional process flowchart, standard BPMN notation, color-coded steps (green for start, blue for process, yellow for decision, red for end), clear directional arrows, swim lanes for different actors
flowchart.expert: {subject}, enterprise BPMN 2.0 compliant process flowchart, professional business process modeling notation with standard symbols (rounded rectangles for tasks, diamonds for gateways, circles for events), color-coded semantic meaning (green=#00AA00 for start events, blue=#0066CC for process tasks, yellow=#FFCC00 for decision gateways, orange=#FF9900 for service tasks, red=#CC0000 for end events, gray=#CCCCCC for subprocesses), horizontal swim lanes clearly labeled for different organizational roles/systems, directional arrows with clear labels indicating conditions and data flow, includes error handling paths and exception flows, annotations for SLA timing, decision criteria documented at each gateway, professional layout with consistent spacing and alignment

wireframe.basic: {subject}, simple wireframe, basic layout, labeled sections
wireframe.detailed: {subject}, professional UX wireframe, grayscale design, clear component hierarchy, labeled UI elements (header, navigation, content areas, sidebar, footer), responsive layout indicators, annotation callouts
wireframe.expert: {subject}, high-fidelity UX wireframe following Material Design / Human Interface Guidelines, professional grayscale palette (headers=#333333, content=#666666, annotations=#999999, backgrounds=#F5F5F5), clear visual hierarchy with proper typography scale (headings 18-24pt, body 14pt, labels 12pt), labeled components with functional annotations (navigation patterns, interaction states, content priority), grid-based layout (8pt/4pt grid system), responsive breakpoint indicators (mobile 375px, tablet 768px, desktop 1440px), component library consistency (buttons, forms, cards, modals), accessibility annotations (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, focus states), detailed interaction notes and user flow indicators

technical.basic: {subject}, technical diagram, schematic style, labeled components
technical.detailed: {subject}, professional technical schematic diagram, engineering drawing style, precise component layout, labeled parts with callouts, dimensional annotations, clean black and white line art
technical.expert: {subject}, professional engineering-grade technical schematic diagram following IEEE/ISO standards, precise orthographic projection, component symbols standardized to industry conventions, detailed part labeling with alphanumeric identifiers, dimensional annotations in engineering notation, exploded view showing assembly relationships, material specifications annotated (metals, plastics, composites), tolerance callouts where critical (+/- 0.1mm), section cut indicators showing internal structure, scale bar for reference, clean CAD-style line art (thick lines 0.5mm for outlines, thin lines 0.25mm for details, dashed lines for hidden edges), professional drafting standards with title block containing part number, revision, date, and scale information

painting.detailed: {subject}, impressionist painting style, visible brushstrokes, vibrant color palette, play of light and shadow, inspired by Claude Monet, artistic interpretation with emphasis on atmosphere over detail
painting.expert: {subject}, masterwork impressionist oil painting in the style of Claude Monet's late Water Lilies series, visible expressive brushstrokes with impasto technique (thick paint application), vibrant complementary color palette (blues and oranges, purples and yellows), masterful play of natural light with emphasis on changing atmospheric conditions, broken color technique where colors mix optically on canvas rather than palette, loose gestural application capturing movement and fleeting moments, emphasis on overall impression and mood over photorealistic detail, professional canvas texture visible, color harmony balancing warm and cool tones, dynamic composition with asymmetric balance, artistic interpretation prioritizing emotional impact and atmospheric effects

digital_art.basic: {subject}, digital artwork, modern style, vibrant colors
digital_art.detailed: {subject}, professional digital art, created in Photoshop/Procreate style, vibrant color palette, clean linework, professional shading and highlights, contemporary illustration aesthetic
digital_art.expert: {subject}, award-winning professional digital illustration created in Adobe Photoshop CC / Procreate workflow, contemporary art style with influences from James Jean and Loish, vibrant saturated color palette with professional color theory application (complementary schemes, analogous harmonies), clean precise vector-quality linework with varying line weights for depth, professional cel-shading technique with smooth gradients, multiple lighting sources (key, fill, rim) creating dimensional form, atmospheric perspective for depth, textured brush effects adding organic feel to digital medium, professional layer organization with non-destructive editing, high resolution (300 DPI minimum), polished professional finish suitable for commercial publication

3d_render.detailed: {subject}, professional 3D rendering, Blender/Cinema 4D quality, photorealistic materials with PBR textures, realistic lighting with HDRI environment, ray-traced reflections and shadows, high detail geometry
3d_render.expert: {subject}, photorealistic 3D architectural visualization rendered in Blender Cycles / V-Ray, professional PBR (Physically Based Rendering) materials with high-resolution 4K textures (diffuse, normal, roughness, metallic, ambient occlusion maps), realistic HDRI environment lighting from professional HDRI Haven library, path-traced global illumination with 2048+ samples for noise-free result, ray-traced reflections and refractions with proper IOR values, subsurface scattering for translucent materials, volumetric lighting with god rays and atmospheric effects, high-poly geometry (2M+ polygons) with subdivision surface smoothing, professional camera settings (35mm focal length, f/2.8 depth of field, realistic exposure), post-processing with lens effects (chromatic aberration, lens distortion, vignetting), color grading in DaVinci Resolve, final output 4K resolution (3840Ã—2160) suitable for commercial presentation

abstract.basic: {subject}, abstract art, geometric shapes, bold colors
abstract.detailed: {subject}, contemporary abstract art, geometric shapes with organic elements, bold complementary color palette, dynamic composition with movement and energy, inspired by Kandinsky and Mondrian
abstract.expert: {subject}, museum-quality contemporary abstract expressionist artwork combining Kandinsky's geometric abstraction with Mondrian's color theory, complex interplay of geometric forms (circles, triangles, rectangles) with organic flowing elements, bold saturated color palette using primary colors (red, blue, yellow) with strategic black and white for contrast, dynamic asymmetric composition creating visual tension and movement, multiple focal points guiding eye movement across canvas, sophisticated spatial relationships with overlapping transparent layers, professional color field technique with both hard-edge precision and gestural spontaneity, textural variation from smooth areas to impasto buildup, mathematical proportions (golden ratio, Fibonacci sequence) underlying seemingly spontaneous composition, emotional intensity balanced with intellectual rigor, suitable for contemporary art museum exhibition

ecommerce.basic: {subject}, product photo for online store, white background
ecommerce.detailed: {subject}, professional e-commerce product photography for Amazon/Shopify, pure white background (255,255,255), well-lit from multiple angles to eliminate shadows, sharp focus on product, clean minimal composition showing product clearly
ecommerce.expert: {subject}, premium e-commerce product photography following Amazon Enhanced Brand Content standards, mathematically pure white background (RGB 255,255,255 verified with colorimeter), shot on Phase One XF IQ4 150MP for ultra-high resolution, Schneider Kreuznach 120mm f/4 Macro LS lens, f/16 aperture for extended depth of field capturing every product detail, ISO 64 for maximum image quality, professional lighting setup with large octabox key light at 45 degrees eliminating harsh shadows, additional fill lights and overhead light creating shadow-free result, product centered precisely with 10% margin on all sides, focus-stacked (5-10 images) ensuring complete sharpness from front to back, professional retouching removing any dust, scratches, or imperfections, color-calibrated to match actual product using X-Rite ColorChecker, ready for marketplace upload at required dimensions

lifestyle.basic: {subject}, lifestyle product photography, natural setting, in use
lifestyle.detailed: {subject}, lifestyle product photography showing product in real-world context, natural setting with complementary props, soft natural lighting, product being used or displayed naturally, aspirational yet relatable scene
lifestyle.expert: {subject}, premium lifestyle product photography for advertising campaign, professional art direction showing product in aspirational real-world context, carefully curated scene with complementary props and styling that enhance without distracting from product, soft diffused natural lighting (golden hour or overcast window light) creating warm inviting atmosphere, product shown being used or displayed in natural believable way, shot on Canon EOS R5 with 50mm f/1.2 RF lens for beautiful bokeh and subject isolation, f/2.8 aperture creating dreamy background separation, thoughtful composition following rule of thirds with product as clear hero, color palette coordinated (complementary or analogous color harmony), human element included showing scale and usage (hands, partial figure), professional styling with attention to detail (wrinkle-free fabrics, fresh flowers, clean surfaces), aspirational yet relatable aesthetic, suitable for Instagram, print advertising, or brand website hero images

editorial.basic: {subject}, editorial product photo, creative angle, artistic
editorial.detailed: {subject}, editorial product photography for magazine feature, creative composition with unusual angle or perspective, artistic lighting creating mood and drama, product styled with editorial flair, high-end fashion/design magazine aesthetic
editorial.expert: {subject}, high-fashion editorial product photography for Vogue/Wallpaper* magazine feature, bold creative composition using unusual perspective (bird's eye view, extreme close-up, dynamic diagonal), dramatic artistic lighting creating strong mood and visual impact (hard shadows, colored gels, rim lighting), product styled with editorial sophistication and artistic direction, shot on Hasselblad H6D-100c medium format for exceptional image quality, professional art direction with conceptual approach elevating product beyond commercial into artistic realm, carefully selected props and background creating cohesive visual story, unconventional color grading enhancing artistic vision, dynamic composition breaking traditional rules for creative impact, professional retouching maintaining artistic integrity, suitable for double-page magazine spread or gallery exhibition

advertising.detailed: {subject}, commercial advertising product photography, hero shot with dramatic lighting, product positioned prominently, eye-catching composition designed to grab attention, commercial appeal with aspirational quality
advertising.expert: {subject}, premium commercial advertising product photography for Super Bowl / Olympics TV campaign, cinematic hero shot with Hollywood-grade dramatic lighting (soft key light with sculpted shadows, rim lights for product separation, practical lighting integrated into scene), product positioned as undeniable hero using forced perspective or dynamic angle emphasizing best features, shot on RED Monstro 8K VV or ARRI ALEXA for motion picture quality, professional commercial production values with full creative team (photographer, art director, stylist, retoucher), eye-catching composition designed for maximum shelf impact and brand recognition, carefully controlled color palette reinforcing brand identity, aspirational luxury aesthetic creating desire, shot on seamless background or photorealistic CGI environment, multiple exposures for perfect lighting control, professional retouching to commercial advertising standards (flawless yet believable), final output suitable for billboards, TV commercials, premium print advertising, with clear negative space for headline and logo placement
